name: ConTroller (Visclodev)
description:
Hey!

This game has been made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam!

The theme was "Out of control"

The goal of my game was to frustrate players by messing with their keybinds so that
they would feel "Out of control"

I hope you enjoyed it, don't forget to check other participants entries at

https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

(sorry for the bad english, I'm french ^^)
<3 <3 <3
